title: Analyze a Commercial Investment Property
description: An investor client is considering buying a multi-tenant retail property and needs a financial analysis.

tasks.description: Gather property financials: purchase price, gross income from rent roll, and operating expenses (taxes, insurance, maintenance).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary financial data.

tasks.description: Calculate the Net Operating Income (NOI) and the Capitalization Rate (Cap Rate).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly calculates NOI and Cap Rate.

tasks.description: Create a pro-forma report summarizing the analysis and key investment metrics for the client.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a clear and accurate investment analysis report.
